Uses of Class
tech.barbero.http.message.signing.HttpMessageSigner.Builder

  • Packages that use HttpMessageSigner.Builder 
    Package Description
    tech.barbero.http.message.signing
    Single package for HTTP message signing.

    • Uses of HttpMessageSigner.Builder in tech.barbero.http.message.signing

      Methods in tech.barbero.http.message.signing that return HttpMessageSigner.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.Builder.addHeaderToSign(String header)
      Adds the given header to the list of header to take into account while creating the signature of the HTTP message.
      abstract HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.Builder.algorithm(HttpMessageSigner.Algorithm algorithm)
      The algorithm to be used to sign the HTTP messages.
      static HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.builder()
      Returns a new builder of HttpMessageSigner.
      abstract HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.Builder.keyId(String keyId)
      The value of the keyId to be specified in the Signature header.
      abstract HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.Builder.keyMap(KeyMap keyMap)
      The key map to be used to find the public/secret key associated with the keyId.
      abstract HttpMessageSigner.Builder HttpMessageSigner.Builder.securityProvider(Provider provider)
      The optional Java Security Provider to be used to find the implementation of the cryptographic algorithms.
